thread.title: Sidharth Malhotra chosen as Tourism New Zealand’s Indian ambassador
thread.title_full: Sidharth Malhotra chosen as Tourism New Zealand’s Indian ambassador

title: Sidharth Malhotra chosen as Tourism New Zealand’s Indian ambassador
text: Sidharth Malhotra chosen as Tourism New Zealand’s Indian ambassador Thursday, 8 October 2015 (24 minutes ago) Sidharth Malhotra is excited to embark on a visit to the picturesque land to experience its diverse landscapes. Young and dashing Bollywood actor Sidharth Malhotra has been named the first Indian ambassador for Tourism New Zealand, which markets New Zealand as a visitor... Bollywood Life 20 minutes ago - India Also reported by • Indian Express • newKerala.com You Might Like
